title: Jersey Shore's Angelina Pivarnick asks for $550 curling iron set in her wedding gift registry
text:
As their wedding date nears, Angelina Pivarnick and her fiance Chris Larangeira are planning their life together.

The Jersey Shore star, 33, and her fiance also 33, have set up a wedding registry for guests - with all the basics needed for newlywed life.

But alongside the $59 paper towel holder and $160 set of towels, are few more surprising wedding gifts.

Indeed the most expensive item on the list is a $550 Dyson hair styling set.

Also on the list is a $400 blow dryer and a $319 vanity.

Gift for one: The most expensive item on the list is a $550 Dyson hair styling set, which we highly doubt Larangeira will be using

Gifted: Angelina Pivarnick, 33, and her fiance Chris Larangeira, 33, have already received a number of the items she asked for in her Bed, Bath & Beyond wedding gift registry (pictured August 20 in New York City)

There are some practical items on the list like a $100 knife block set and a $174 Rachael Ray 12-piece cookware set.

The reality TV star is also looking to get a $200 Google Nest indoor security cam.

According to TMZ, that's the same camera that caught Jenni 'JWoww' Farley's ex husband, Roger Mathews, during the domestic abuse incident that ended their marriage.

And as for JWoww, 33, it's unlikely she'll be attending the wedding ceremony, which still doesn't have a date or location, much less giving Pivarnick any gifts.

Interesting requests: Also on the list is a $400 blow dryer and a $319 vanity

In an episode of Jersey Shore that aired on October 10, viewers watched as JWoww's boyfriend, Zack Carpinello, wrapped his hand around Pivarnick's waist in a nightclub and touched her behind as a drunk JWoww snoozed nearby.

JWoww said she initially wrote the night off as 'funny and no big deal,' but took issue with Pivarnick's confessional during the episode where she said she felt uncomfortable.

JWoww said Pivarnick spoke about 'how fun the night was (in text) and then [went] in front of a camera and [said] the opposite.'

Pivarnick had allegedly texted JWoww after the club incident, telling her she had had a great time.
description: The Jersey Shore star, 33, has already received a number of the items she asked for in her Bed, Bath & Beyond wedding gift registry, including a $59 paper towel holder and a $160 set of towels.
